summary: Adds a huge dungeon with 16 bosses
descriptionHtml:
Dungeons : Temple of the Lord
By Lord Dagobert
December 2012

CHECK THE IMAGE FOR THE LOCATION!

-Adds a huge dungeon divided in 6 cells, interior and exterior, with 16 bosses (check at the end for the list and their loots).

-All the enemies respawn so you can do the dungeon again, the bosses drop celestial gems. These gems allow you to craft brand new items.

-2 new armor sets. They will randomly drop from some bosses, improve them at the workbench with celestial gems!

-New necklaces, rings, aprons, gloves, gems, etc. that you can craft with the celestial gems

-Random daedric,dragonscale & dragonbone loots

-Epic Fights

And more!


List of Loots:


Entrance:
Warden Ahkar: 1 Celestial Gem + Enchanted Gloves + 1 random loot (25% chance Celestial Gem, 50% random dragon armor, 25% random daedric weapon)


Courtyard:
Archmage Rhaljk : 1 celestial gem + 1 random loot (25% chance Celestial Gem, 50% random dragon armor, 25% random daedric weapon)
Guardian of the Trial : 1 Celestial gem + 1 random loot (25% chance Celestial Gem, 50% random dragon armor, 25% random daedric weapon)
Rodel the Wise: 1 Celestial Gem + 1 random loot (25% chance Celestial Gem, 50% random dragon armor, 25% random daedric weapon)
Archmande Vjorn : 1 celestial gem + 1 random loot (Legendary Boots, Boots of the Lord, or 1 Celestial Gem)

King\'s Trial:
The Beast: 1 Celestial Gem + 2 random loot (Legendary Gloves, Gloves of the Lord, 8 magicka potions, or 8 health potions)


Halls of Wisdom:
Archmage Zenthar : 1 celestial gem + 1 random loot (25% chance Celestial Gem, 50% random dragon armor, 25% random daedric weapon)
Restless Guardian : 1 celestial gem + 1 random loot (25% chance Celestial Gem, 50% random dragon armor, 25% random daedric weapon)
Colossus : 1 celestial gem + 1 random loot (Legendary Helmet, Hood of the Lord, or 1 Celestial Gem)


Hall of Gods:
Mutated Wraith : 1 celestial gem + 1 random loot (25% chance Celestial Gem, 50% random dragon armor, 25% random daedric weapon)
The Gearmaster : 1 celestial gem + 1 random loot (25% chance Celestial Gem, 50% random dragon armor, 25% random daedric weapon)
Frenzied Centurion : 1 celestial gem + 1 random loot (25% chance Celestial Gem, 50% random dragon armor, 25% random daedric weapon)
Archmage Khargof : 1 celestial gem + 1 random loot (25% chance Celestial Gem, 50% random dragon armor, 25% random daedric weapon)
Guardian of the Gods : 1 celestial gem + 1 random loot (25% chance Celestial Gem, 50% random dragon armor, 25% random daedric weapon)


Celestial Lair:
Steward of the Lord : 2 celestial gems + 1 random loot (25% chance Celestial Gem, 50% random dragon armor, 25% random daedric weapon)
Lord Dagobert : 3 celestial gems + Enchanted Sword + 1 random armor ( Legendary Armor or Robes of the Lord) + 1 random loot (25% chance Celestial Gem, 50% random dragon armor, 25% random daedric weapon)
author: Lord Dagobert
